name: Attleboro Juvenile Court
description: The Bristol County Juvenile Court in Attleboro serves Attleboro, Mansfield, North Attleboro, and Norton.

name: Barnstable Juvenile Court

address.orig_address: 3195 Main Street, P.O. Box 427, Barnstable, MA 02630

description: The Barnstable County, town of Plymouth Division of the Juvenile Court in Barnstable serves Barnstable, Sandwich, Yarmouth.

name: Belchertown Juvenile Court
description: The Franklin-Hampshire Counties Juvenile Court in Belchertown serves Belchertown, Granby and Ware.

name: Boston Juvenile Court

address.orig_address: 24 New Chardon St., P.O. Box 9663, Boston, MA 02114

description: The Suffolk County Juvenile Court in Boston serves Brighton, Charlestown, Roxbury and South Boston for delinquency, harassment, and criminal cases. Care and protection, child requiring assistance (CRA) and jury trials for all sessions in Suffolk County are held here.

name: Brockton Juvenile Court
description: The Plymouth County Juvenile Court in Brockton serves Abington, Bridgewater, Brockton, E. Bridgewater, W. Bridgewater, and Whitman.

name: Cambridge Juvenile Court
description: The Middlesex County Juvenile Court in Cambridge serves Arlington, Belmont, Cambridge, Everett, Malden, Medford, Melrose, Somerville, and Wakefield.

name: Chelsea Juvenile Court
description: The Suffolk County Juvenile Court in Chelsea serves Chelsea, Revere, East Boston, and Winthrop for delinquency, harassment and criminal cases. Care and protection, child requiring assistance and jury trials for all sessions are heard in the Boston session.  Substance abuse and mental Illness cases are heard in all sites within the Suffolk County Juvenile Court.

name: Dedham Juvenile Court
description: The Norfolk County Juvenile Court in Dedham serves Avon, Canton, Dedham, Dover, Foxborough, Franklin, Medfield, Medway, Millis, Needham, Norfolk, Norwood, Plainville, Sharon, Stoughton, Walpole, Wellesley, Westwood, and Wrentham.

name: Dorchester Juvenile Court
description:
This court is formally called the Suffolk County Juvenile Court - Dorchester. Delinquency, harassment and criminal cases for the area covered by the Boston Police's Dorchester Division. 
All care and protections, child requiring assistance and jury trials are heard in the Boston session.  Substance abuse and mental Illness cases are heard in all sites within the Suffolk County Juvenile Court.

name: Dudley Juvenile Court
description: The Worcester County Juvenile Court in Dudley serves Charlton, Dudley, Oxford, Southbridge, Sturbridge, and Webster.

name: Edgartown Juvenile Court

address.orig_address: 12 Mariner's Way, Unit 4, P.O. Box 550, Edgartown, MA 02539
address.address: 12 Mariner's Way, Unit 4, P.O. Box 550, Edgartown, MA 02539

description: The Barnstable County-Town of Plymouth Division of the Juvenile Court in Edgartown serves Aquinnah, Chilmark, Edgartown, Gosnold, Oaks Bluff, Tisbury, West Tisbury

name: Fall River Juvenile Court

address.orig_address: 289 Rock St., 4th Floor, Fall River, MA 02720

description: The Bristol County Juvenile Court in Fall River serves Fall River, Freetown, Somerset, Swansea, and Westport.

name: Falmouth Juvenile Court
description: The Barnstable County-Town of Plymouth Division of the Juvenile Court in Falmouth serves Bourne, Falmouth, and Mashpee.

name: Fitchburg Juvenile Court
description: The Worcester County Juvenile Court in Fitchburg serves Ashburnham, Fitchburg, Gardner, Hubbardston, Lunenburg, Petersham, Phillipston, Royalston, Templeton, Westminster and Winchendon.

name: Framingham Juvenile Court
description: The Middlesex County Juvenile Court in Framingham serves Acton, Ashland, Bedford, Carlisle, Concord, Framingham, Holliston, Hopkinton, Hudson, Lexington, Lincoln, Marlborough, Maynard, Natick, Sherborn, Stow, Sudbury, and Wayland.

name: Great Barrington Juvenile Court
description: The Berkshire County Juvenile Court in Great Barrington serves Alford, Becket, Egremont, Great Barrington, Lee, Lenox, Monterey, Mt. Washington, New Marlborough, Otis, Sandisfield, Sheffield, Stockbridge, Tyringham, and West Stockbridge (Pittsfield Juvenile Court exercises concurrent jurisdiction in Becket and Lenox).

name: Greenfield Juvenile Court
description:
The Franklin-Hampshire Counties Juvenile Court in Greenfield serves Ashfield, Bernardston, Buckland, Charlemont, Colrain, Conway, Deerfield, Gill, Greenfield, Hawley, Heath, Leyden, Monroe, Montague, Northfield, Rowe, Shelburne, Sunderland and Whately.

Hampshire County Juvenile Court jury cases are held at the Northampton District Court.  Jury cases in Franklin County (including Athol which is in Worcester County) are held at the Greenfield Juvenile Court.

name: Hadley Juvenile Court
description: This court serves Amherst, Chesterfield, Cummington, Easthampton, Goshen, Hadley, Hatfield, Huntington, Middlefield, Northampton, Pelham, Plainfield, Southampton, South Hadley, Westhampton, Williamsburg and Worthington.

name: Hingham Juvenile Court
description: The Plymouth County Juvenile Court in Hingham serves Hanover, Hingham, Hull, Norwell, Rockland, and Scituate.

name: Holyoke Juvenile Court
description: The Hampden County Juvenile Court in Holyoke serves Blandford, Chester, Granville, Holyoke, Montgomery, Russell, Southwick, Tolland, and Westfield.

name: Lawrence Juvenile Court

address.orig_address: Fenton Judicial Center, 2 Appleton Street, Lawrence, MA 01840

description: The Essex County Juvenile Court in Lawrence serves Andover, Boxford, Bradford, Georgetown, Groveland, Haverhill, Lawrence, Methuen, and North Andover.

name: Lowell Juvenile Court
description:
The Middlesex County Juvenile Court in Lowell serves Ashby, Ayer, Billerica, Boxborough, Burlington, Chelmsford, Dracut, Dunstable, Groton, Littleton, Lowell, North Reading, Pepperell, Reading, Shirley, Stoneham, Tewksbury, Townsend, Tyngsborough, Westford, Wilmington, Winchester and Woburn. 

Care and Protection cases are heard in Cambridge. Delinquency, Youthful Offender, Adult Criminal, Harassment, and Child Requiring Assistance cases are heard in Lowell.

name: Lynn Juvenile Court
description: The Essex County Juvenile Court in Lynn serves Lynn, Marblehead, Nahant, Saugus, and Swampscott.

name: Milford Juvenile Court
description: The Worcester County Juvenile Court in Milford serves Bellingham, Blackstone, Douglas, Hopedale, Mendon, Milford, Millville, Northbridge, Sutton, Upton, and Uxbridge.

name: Nantucket Juvenile Court
description: The Barnstable County-Town of Plymouth Division of the Juvenile Court in Nantucket serves all towns in Nantucket County.

name: New Bedford Juvenile Court

address.orig_address: 75 N. Sixth St., New Bedford, MA 02740

description: The Bristol County Juvenile Court in New Bedford serves Acushnet, Dartmouth, Fairhaven, Freetown, New Bedford, and Westport.

name: Newburyport Juvenile Court

address.orig_address: 188 State St. , Route 1, Traffic Circle, Newburyport, MA 01950

description: The Essex County Juvenile Court in Newburyport serves Amesbury, Essex, Hamilton, Ipswich, Merrimac, Newbury, Newburyport, Rowley, Salisbury, Topsfield, Wenham, and West Newbury.

name: North Adams Juvenile Court
description: The Berkshire County Juvenile Court in North Adams serves Adams, Cheshire, Clarksburg, Florida, Hancock, New Ashford, North Adams, Savoy, Williamstown, and Windsor (Pittsfield Division exercises concurrent jurisdiction in Windsor and Hancock).

name: Orange Juvenile Court
description:
The Franklin-Hampshire Counties Juvenile Court in Orange serves Athol, Erving, Leverett, New Salem, Orange, Shutesbury, Warwick and Wendell.
Hampshire County Juvenile Court jury cases are held at the Northampton District Court.  Jury cases in Franklin County (including Athol which is in Worcester County) are held at the Greenfield Juvenile Court.)

name: Orleans Juvenile Court
description: The Barnstable County-Town of Plymouth Division of the Juvenile Court in Orleans serves Brewster, Chatham, Dennis, Eastham, Harwich, Orleans, Provincetown, Truro, and Wellfleet.

name: Palmer Juvenile Court
description: The Hampden County Juvenile Court in Palmer serves Brimfield, East Longmeadow, Hampden, Holland, Ludlow, Monson, Palmer, Wales, and Wilbraham.

name: Pittsfield Juvenile Court
description:
The Berkshire County Juvenile Court in Pittsfield serves Becket, Dalton, Hancock, Hinsdale, Lanesborough, Lenox, Peru, Pittsfield, Richmond, Washington, Windsor. 

(This court exercises concurrent jurisdiction in Windsor and Hancock)

name: Plymouth Juvenile Court
description: The Barnstable County-Town of Plymouth Division of the Juvenile Court in Plymouth serves Duxbury, Halifax, Hanson, Kingston, Marshfield, Pembroke, Plymouth, and Plympton.

name: Quincy Juvenile Court
description:
The Norfolk County Juvenile Court in Quincy serves Braintree, Cohasset, Holbrook, Milton, Quincy, Randolph, and Weymouth.

Care and Protection are filed in Dedham.  

Delinquency, Youthful Offender, and Adult Criminal are heard in Quincy, with the exception of Jury Trials which are heard in Dedham.

name: Salem Juvenile Court
description: The Essex County Juvenile Court in Salem serves Beverly, Danvers, Lynnfield, Manchester-by-the-Sea, Peabody and Salem.

name: Springfield Juvenile Court
description: The Hampden County Juvenile Court in Springfield serves Agawam, Chicopee, Longmeadow, Springfield, and West Springfield.

name: Stoughton Juvenile Court
description: Cases are heard at the Norfolk County Juvenile Court in Stoughton when scheduled by the court.

name: Taunton Juvenile Court
description: The Bristol County Juvenile Court in Taunton serves Berkley, Dighton, Easton, Raynham, Rehoboth, Seekonk and Taunton.

name: Waltham Juvenile Court
description: The Middlesex County Juvenile Court in Waltham serves Concord, Newton, Watertown, Waltham and Weston.

name: Wareham Juvenile Court
description: The Plymouth County Juvenile Court in Wareham serves Carver, Lakeville, Marion, Mattapoisett, Middleborough, Rochester, and Wareham.

name: West Roxbury Juvenile Court
description: This court is formally called Suffolk County Juvenile Court-West Roxbury. Delinquency, harassment and criminal cases for the area covered by the Boston Police's West Roxbury Division. All care and protections, child requiring assistance and jury trials are heard in the Boston session.  Substance abuse and mental Illness cases are heard in all sites within the Suffolk County Juvenile Court.

name: Worcester Juvenile Court
description: The Worcester County Juvenile Court in Worcester serves Auburn, Barre, Berlin, Bolton, Boylston, Brookfield, Clinton, East Brookfield, Grafton, Hardwick, Harvard, Holden, Lancaster, Leicester, Millbury, New Braintree, Northborough, North Brookfield, Oakham, Paxton, Rutland, Shrewsbury, Southborough, Spencer, Sterling, Warren, Westborough, West Boylston, West Brookfield and Worcester.
